mapper.insert: insert into fitness_history (userId, trainingDay, trainingLevel, trainingName, calorie, calorieUnit, trainingTime, trainingTimeUnit, mainTrainingPoint, trainingPoints, validStatus, insertTime, updateTime) values (#{userId}, #{trainingDay}, #{trainingLevel}, #{trainingName}, #{calorie}, #{calorieUnit}, #{trainingTime}, #{trainingTimeUnit}, #{mainTrainingPoint}, #{trainingPoints}, #{validStatus}, #{insertTime}, #{updateTime})
